def_cn: (用于构成不可数名词)表示“…主义”，“…学说”，“…信仰”，“…运动”
def_en: -ism is used to form uncount nouns that refer to political or religious movements and beliefs.

def_cn: (用于构成不可数名词)表示“…行为”,“…态度”
def_en: -ism is used to form uncount nouns that refer to attitudes and behaviour.

def_cn: (用于构成不可数名词）表示“对（特定群体)的歧视”，“对…的敌意”
def_en: -ism is used to form uncount nouns that refer to unfair or hostile treatment of a particular group of people.
